# type-challenges

A repository for storing all my solutions to the **awesome** type challenges found on https://github.com/type-challenges/type-challenges.

The title of the challenge is a hyperlink to the TS playground with the full solution and tests, and below the title is just its solution.
## Easy
#### [4 - Pick](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play#-lBBbZEciIFdlP1jVAcVBjsssBEIAA1JUQeQAcXSAAkmPhwVQKBRrOJ9sBgHVUFQigArcRFdYxYDQMAgYBaUAQAD6+YLhYLEAAmpkNhUARA-YlXEX6-mIJmtHiWvTGZ0gpsthcyPd6jR8PGRLVQmFu73+xB0CJCEMIIFXSqsABtMKzwp6mdz4aBBr1dfEbaTg8QAD84Q34LIZMSAF1ZWvZ3ewDjsyA8w2iwujNkyhIpi--KLSK9ExE0N8cyAwtViYCZeg2ABlC5w0-KbcybLNQBdCAFqoTgSQgOdZu+dFyMqYNQ3DSNozSuNE2TBJU2gYBuHEFJEm2j1KRO5QzslC6wwjKMYzupMUzTYBxFO0FJW2ul1lcMo9uUYi4gjCAQ0B66QYTMHHozLMgA)

```ts
type MyPick<T extends object, K extends keyof T> = {
  [Key in keyof T as Key extends K ? Key : never]: T[Key]
}
```

#### [7 - Readonly](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play#-iYXSoNQa-nNTZYBrqsIq7XIMaYDUQYDACAAUTUUzUnK+2B+lUBwNUfR2sqoFxmdEIlLFDUNxtNOGVEA15FtkO9vv9QZDYe+v22khjvWruwIEymydTsTRzUVADU5MgigtVABxUpatjkTkMOh0HwSJF+jGGBgNPQSBpQrLAaBgEDAKygCAAfUPR+PR4gAE1ytC2kyIDqNAeT4-9xBt1YUx8pTLEvhUoqVeSoHjb8IAAbQAaXqVQzHwW4UgAXU5FJwLgsABTAPcn0fZYnEqFpUDWHpMJPF8dzkXwoQ2AYwlJQMAEc2FQXADgDWFBmMCA+Qgfgpi8CAAHJuHfZA4AXRj-B5JxgAqBQJD4t8qM+fD5hVECiBYti6CSAN6MYpJP00b9UjFABGNIDi-bQjKwUy0jMsAULAbFcXxQkTNVSlShpDp6SgTNWXZc0uR8z5MERdZXk5chrX8PgiECOhUE5ACoF6ComFDIKeQdNCMKI092FmM5oQAZRxacHzy59X1AIhFWKhhbTCGC2GhCRMFwaT2nHSdp1nYB50XZdVzUddoGAPgJCKPJaogbte1WdrOuFbqpxnOcjUGlc1w3YA2o6gLMQgRUJShMIWgasYghyGcIAnVa+oGpctpGrcdyAA)

```ts
type MyReadonly<T> = {
  readonly [K in keyof T]: T[K]
}
```

#### [11 - Tuple to object](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play#-cXEACaOwC6MWwQiz8NFouGSOBcphQGAim1QYyQ+FICVwAB5QSl8P48KssAA+CDAYADQYpagtCAAbzu+zYhx242pByOJzO7xuDLej2ur1ZXJeHN5zx5D0uXwFIs+OwAvrQZlNuviAGocLAAdzi-FsuAAEigSAzMrhcGg2ONCXNKJkOmQ2B0ggBzYCwMAgYC6UAQAD63p9vp9n3wKBcEAAwg8INqsBCvX7Y56IK7dOicHDsAikaoUUhifsuGl-hDZGk+BhWAIuChgpVgwAfdi4Fzce0QOsKKv4DDiLbffGbCm0LYAaUiyC2FarUe+3wZg7AMrAHrjseQpgiIfkphjS-9iY4oyCEWTlIgAFEAI4oQreE8k1QQKUQfz1UI7ITJ+CWwrYLj20zAFDmBgbA7LogLLDiGzbHsTLCmysF8vBoo-H8AJLDQYGHjiABylbVpBWzQN4ABM3hXN4AAsvzyKhQJgBh2JjAAshwgz4YRdxEbcZF3ORyHURhSZggCG7--faLpukAA)

```ts
type TupleToObject<T extends readonly (number | string | symbol)[]> = {
  [K in T[number]]: K
}
```

#### [14 - First of array](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play#-cHQU73esQRdQRW9wgjxg-u2tzCYU2R4HhOCZ57l6x18E0iLEC0CXLerbkLyOCeOGEBDo+QiAcBoEvm+UDHp+p5dj+V5+q+qYZh4KHvie34XjhfCenIVRptk8EUea1FQkRLzbh445YDch5QPi06YAgcgfhC-FkL0NBXo0rB4NgpAUJQjSvjQPEVPxgnYMJ7FiX+rbxry6xpAAMqgiSNLBCn5iAGpVrq-DoJwWYAMqQkKllWeqNZgKANBAvZHCqOclCGn0mB4NYK5GCUvL8oKwqipg4pSjKcoKrAwBiJgjIeF5ED0kyEDBaFq7cMKfICkKIrAGKErSrK6DynAwD5WFRVZQAsr05zGr51gLgYkWlTFFVxVViW1UqKpAA)

```ts
type First<T extends any[]> = T["length"] extends 0 ? never : T[0]
```

#### [18 - Length of tuple](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play#-CAACQAoq8AGqnOYAEQASq8AOK-A4AZVIr0RGLBAEkAAoHMEAVQAsq8-hjCa8PhCzMh8SiwaRzq0en0XAN5KkcPgRny8AAeKaDAB8UGAwAgtT6IUiwQALJcuTc7g8hQKUBh+cL1fddpLpbKavLFRAAKz0dpJVqS6HcVAAd0IghR3GwYPILCaEFw2GwlE4TWlnRCuAAdAArTiRqyYYBwMAgYAaUAQAD62ZzuZzEGOPmsH224LiUTzlezEFTGk5US1wtIpsi6ECnAg4XkgQE1A48nQbFGZ0lI1IowARIV+ROLmAM1XK2QDNgIB9FAYs4vczW09xGlZV-WIABvCAQgCO5Hk1E8ELNqAVEAAvhAiJYCPVNiJ6wgIzfpwMYByCMahOHGDQQgEQxuWmYYxkmHkDgWI41mQ7YVn2OYUJ2U4zicDsoPQQwwCImCDQeJ4EOBb4-kBOYaNBSEYThTYkVRdE5ixHE8SJEkKSpCAaTpBkmRZNl8MUUJoOwOsrlCDcO2eeh73NYVL2vahhUbesSjFeRxU8JVxUMlSHwVdSrxvbTdRFXSSAoo1PEtEz3HoE0f04BA5UfbBvMsD9LHoRsXLcqUZU87zzL8uJAuC2zcGFcZ8moagCAgZ0rGoQJxlMucF23fMzHISw8DiITImDLdCszXd53AKBJQxXB5HCLwiy4AhqBA4xiL9AMgxDMNOAjGM4wTJNYGAAdOGdOJ6AdJ1XU4Lqeug-rA2DUNgHDKNY3jSxEzgYAVu6oxoIWiBySsKIPha1LdQMDbBu23axoOzAUzTIA)

```ts
type Length<T extends readonly any[]> = T["length"]
```

#### [43 - Exclude](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play#code/PQKgUABBAsDMEFoIFEAeBjANgVwCYFNJEETSiAjATwgC0ALfRgOwHMIAKAAQC8HmWAlBADE+AIYBnasPLYAlpgAuCOUxHYmcgPZMwRYQYgBFbPgmLtuogEkAtgAdM+W-iaKIihhFkLlqlBg4BAA8ACoANBAAqgB8elAxAVh4+BAAZgBOWrYQoR50WhKpipT2Zvli7mIZqZIScixMYuROHlrR8RAAYloZEPioYg5OAFydAAaTihJEJWUQAEpm2EoQALwQALKUaMkhAORi+xAAPhD75Mdn++j7kYf7icDA55en57dEk+OdiQBqcnwAHcIDoIABxOSKAAS2HIIwgdEUinsEhGz2m6DoADoAFYSbG9FjAOBgEDAPSgCAAfVpdPpdIgAE0tNg+gBhLQECDQ-A1GkMwXUiDkvRzVLbXZBfBhSKxda5fqoRSuXASaIQAD8ECY+AAbnyIAjQpSQAKhfTcmZ3OzJOULQyRRS5A5eu5xRAAN4oACO2DEmEiaDK6HcAF90lkcvtOOKEFiA05WGZgNgLJgJPsxaVUug7eqNgBtIjB-Ch4LIP0B4KSwIpYIPd4XK4fO7nI4xe5va63GKdkuoEOKCtVzA1nZ1g5HJvd1v3afXS6d1t98IDocj-1j2t7GXmDKqNhnJjYWzkQ1ndjsIRrRJ6rRyXACSJdDShyzL-eH94ns981dgAAuqa5oOsKr4ZJ4hoAMoqqioEOk6YCgEQiTQXQ1SpJQrJ9BIWg4BYOhooiyKouiwCYji+KEhkxJwMAYhMBIQJ8qhEAAsCEB4QRljEUiKJohiEhYniBJEiSsDANxaa8Wxmy9Kk7IYZgSYsGYCL8WRQkidRRJkhSQA)

```ts
type MyExclude<T, U> = T extends U ? never : T
```

#### [189 - Awaited](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play#code/PQKgUABBCMAcCcEC0ECCB3AhgSwC4FMATSZJM8kgIwE8IBZTAY23wCsIBlbAawHsAnTBAAUAAQC2TFqwDOPAZgCUEAMT5MM2ioAO--GYRhkSGFHi8PiQ0CQABYAKzcePKGhKiRSNiOhQGo0ms1stXjUyUCqMfR2rOyeSCRS8iAANRY9R8EAA4nhqqX9vnTebgNCUhVZBUBK1gHB4GAQMAHKAIAB9Zcr1criAATV4pn4EAAwrxRjVg8Y12flxBZw44TUNPz8LYbgANFlogDesImtn2wh8ATJASWDshA-pg-CtPsT7KCiLLNNQ0GwbY1BgAAvteyJ0FSWB4EQNzPKsawELYhCDNUd5fjcpi2Nwth1LYbyvhAYD4esREkbeMj3o+dgBMGEBEiyYCzPxBFsaR5EPjccGCVAwmYdSOF0gJTFQPsRJMfstj4FE-AANzziAS7nmuEDPFG+4aB4RnGeuV7YFsUqEsYb4AsKGoADQAms8SMJ0KEynKADkohwkgKQajstjtDIwCmF4FgyIF6H5E+FIYtcNyclF+I3huaVlBlLmAfgFggRAtimOIlB8ShOXIgAWvlVxGDc6UtVlrQQAAPuVlXVfwDFgDe9XQE1mKtQVLVtViuA4lF3UQJQvC8DszQMXV+T4e+8oPj+f4AUBRCgeBml9cGCFdEhF1wRAaFDciTRhhSiokA8Pm4PcbkWDc8nYbSz5vJ5HUMe5r3efgvmfaYGo-VhNK4RugMQEVLCladVU1SDYPvVDMO-fDdL1UjHULRVGMDYD2MQx9dxfbDCn-SNxOzbiC1LSt6j0ZTUBvdTuPffjil4UjZP9VjerzuyIXhus71IMGej8Pd+QKysaKC-9ovBviYALjZq4QIsO7jHxHAEKa1n65ec6gCQLIcOE-DGNQ267jIK1xWKZrHMa-ZskOoQjjIY7gZOCAusMIRK1ALLNvg9TuxYns+N7faFoOvqB6O45h-AwCJ8nwx2-QAjGHu4QWJF0W9r76cB0HIetDOc5AA)

```ts
type MyAwaited<T extends HasThen<unknown>> = 
T extends HasThen<infer R> 
? R extends HasThen<any> 
  ? MyAwaited<R> 
  : R 
: never
```
#### [268 - If](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play#-E3r4TFhDRM4QRZkGx2ABc-z80PyWB+7gAghAALxodCBI4GcIAcjI2Jx+GxsSgwGAwKWVBWaxcm22EFx2LhPncACEUWjApcWFQcXiCUSIKTyctVutae5sYSsNC-P9iQA1FRURIQCr0MoACSY+HBEDY4nEQhY4NJ+XSEwAViwJmcAObAODwMAgYCaUAQAD6Xu9Pu9EAAmlwmAdglxiu4NVR6u5fbGvRAXZp4RzguTVj0CvguFw7G9wlEAcTUanFunigVMe4APyRCC66JukCeuO+yKGZzBUSGZstv2JlQ2M7OZMAbwgAFEAI5MNrhccUlYQAC+-XqXCs9IE8KQ6TadlMtsMwE8LEZYGTqS7BVRAG0sPORYEpzOaIEgpXefj6YTYp-Yr-7wXcQn2nNo33RLkeXpPkYF-WCAIAXTdMktxYJBFhFdD6jXepz2ZYFsKBVEglMJgaBoT9+ViRse17D0AWDVwowgABlVYjVo3sE1dUAsGJFi2DIaMIEIIMDhYHNVDMY09QNI0TWAM02Eta07QdBBgDeFhEijPiIEVZUIAk5hylMGT9UNY1TRYc0rRtep7UdYBjKksy9IAWTOdxgkE8jHEPcy5KsxSbOUuy7WdV0gA)

```ts
type If<C extends boolean, T, F> = C extends true ? T : F
```

#### [533 - Concat](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play#code/PQKgUABBCsDMsQLQQMIHsB2BjAhgF0iUWJMICMBPCAQQwBMAnAUyoGkGcBnNAN04GsqACgACZZrAAM-DgDYAnFk4BKCAGImXKmpwMOFMITXGIARQCuTTngCWmQ1ACSAWwAOAGybOmGPBDwAFkwQAFI4PDgAylgMNq5+AAbUejgUAHRYmLh4CRAAZubYtpgQNhj+Qf4UrsGcFNZeaTRVNf44-FYVwXgA7mgQugDm5t6+nE0AKpVo5niusxCcATPudBBkwTgQGEw9AylUgfil2O7mdJ1l83icJxDueAwQaAwXDA4QAGIvEEwAHjg3J4AFwfBLgm6EPDVYIAJSs5geEAAvKgsvgADwAbQAjABdAA0ECxACY8QA+CDAYC--uDh-otesZvviH7shSH5flev53gBwZARyEBkm+sBEgALBSIGckSqEQBh5KQVAl5jtet7-o+mJYvOOLzthC6wPOL55IOp5EmQaBoJ4UZEvOaGMWBVE0XR84MUSzF7kwbEcVxGA8XxEGfkWYBmvW5afOYDCBO6ECRIyri3Kptp+qAhCUpEAS6MEFCOosnE7pgyryoq+kqsAaoatqaS6vq8DAFGnA9O6pkQIKwrcGcxQYI5CpKq57lajqDB6gawDhfZUXBQAsi8wQoBZ7jrpu0XOcqqqcOqCVeUlRomkAA)

```ts
type Concat<T extends any[], U extends any[]> = [...T, ...U]
```
